description: Data ingestion script converting a STAC catalog to data on disk.
name: kitware/stac_ingress

optional_parameters.description: API Key for accessing the STAC endpoint
optional_parameters.name: stac_api_key

optional_parameters.description: Don't actually download the retrieved imagery
optional_parameters.help_text: If set to '1' this algorithm will use the '--dryrun' flag on any aws commands, meaning that no data will be copied locally.
optional_parameters.name: dry_run

optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results to ingress.
optional_parameters.help_text: Set a maximum number of results to ingress, if less than or equal to 0 no maximum will be imposed.  Useful for testing and debugging.
optional_parameters.name: max_results

optional_parameters.description: Maximum amount of cloud cover allowed before a STAC item is filtered out
optional_parameters.help_text: The cloud cover value here is as reported in the STAC item's "properties" "eo:cloudcover" field, if specified.  If the property is not specified, the item is not filtered out.
optional_parameters.name: max_cloud_cover

optional_parameters.description: Minimum amount of overlap an image must have with the selected AOI to be kept
optional_parameters.name: min_aoi_overlap

outputs.description: Directory where images / data have been written.
outputs.name: output_dir

required_parameters.description: Spatial bounds of the Area of Interest (AOI), in WGS84 (EPSG4326).
required_parameters.help_text: The AOI bounds should be in the form: '[min_lon, min_lat, max_lon, max_lat]'.  Note that these coordinates should be in the WGS84 (also called EPSG4326) CRS.
required_parameters.name: aoi_bounds

required_parameters.description: Only retrieve images with timestamps within the specified start and end date.
required_parameters.help_text: Date range should be in the form: '["start_date", "end_date"]' where "start_date" and "end_date" are UTC formatted date/timestamps.
required_parameters.name: date_range

required_parameters.description: URL for the STAC API endpoint
required_parameters.name: stac_api_url

required_parameters.description: Directory where output images / data will be written.  Will be created if it doesn't already exist.
required_parameters.name: output_dir

required_parameters.description: List of STAC collections to retrieve results from
required_parameters.display_name: Search within these specified STAC collections
required_parameters.name: collections
